name: Airshot Arena
description:
Welcome to Airshot Arena!!
Hope you like your stay in this chaotic and skillful game!

Airshot Arena's main gamemode is "Domination", which is basically "Deathmatch" but you have to collect "Heads" dropped by dead players to gain points.
There are 2 teams fighting against each other, and the one with the most points wins.
Airshot Arena has mechanics influenced by multiple games, mostly CS and TF2.

Controls:
WASD to Move.
Mouse to Look Around.
Left Click to Shoot.
Space to Jump.
Q to Hide Viewmodel.
ESC to Exit to Menu.
